description.message: Collate all the links on the page into an easily accessible panel

lock.description: Text on button in panel that prevents changes to the list of links

unlock.description: Text on button in panel that auto updates the latest set of links

search.description: Prompt to filter the list of links

failed.message: Could not get any links from tab
failed.description: The extension failed to get links from the page

noLinks.description: The page doesn't have any <a> links, or the current search filter doesn't return anything
